detail.labelDiscountPeriod: *For the first month - | *For the first {months} months -

sw-extension-buy-modal.title: Add extension
sw-extension-buy-modal.labelAcceptPermissions: I am aware this extension needs permissions
sw-extension-buy-modal.labelAcceptPrivacyExtensions: I am aware that I need to extend my privacy policy

successNotification.subtitleSuccess: You can now try out your new extension.

alertCanNotBuy.text: You need to be logged-in in the Store to do this

sw-ratings-card.labelNoReviews: This extension hasn't received any ratings or reviews yet.

sw-extension-deactivation-modal.description:
The "{extensionName}" extension has a monthly subscription fee.
Deactivating the extension will not cancel the subscription and fees will continue to be collected!
sw-extension-deactivation-modal.descriptionCancel: If you want to cancel the subscription instead, you can remove it in the context menu under "{removeLabel}".
sw-extension-deactivation-modal.alertDeactivate: Do you still want to deactivate the extension?

sw-extension-permissions-modal.title: {extensionLabel} permissions
sw-extension-permissions-modal.description: {extensionLabel} will get access to the following components. Click the link next to the component to show the entity details.

sw-extension-privacy-policy-extensions-m.title: {extensionLabel}: privacy policy extensions
sw-extension-privacy-policy-extensions-m.intro: This app processes personal information. The manufacturer gives following advice for the adjustments of your privacy policy:

sw-extension-store-purchased.textEmptyState: If you install apps, they will be listed here.

sw-extension-removal-modal.description: If you remove the extension, you can no longer use it.
sw-extension-removal-modal.alertCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel and remove the extension?
sw-extension-removal-modal.alertRemove: Are you sure you want to remove the extension?

sw-extension-uninstall-modal.title: "{extensionName}" uninstall
sw-extension-uninstall-modal.description: If you uninstall the extension, you can no longer use it.
sw-extension-uninstall-modal.alert: Are you sure you want to uninstall the extension?
sw-extension-uninstall-modal.helpTextRemovePluginData: Warning: All data of the app will be removed permanently. This process is irreversible.

FRAMEWORK__TOC_NOT_ACCEPTED.message: You have to accept our terms and conditions to proceed.

FRAMEWORK__EXTENSION_THEME_STILL_IN_USE.message: The theme is currently still used in one or more sales channels.

FRAMEWORK__INVALID_EXTENSION_ID.message: The extension identification number is invalid.

FRAMEWORK__INVALID_VARIANT_ID.message: The identification number of the price model of the extension is invalid.

FRAMEWORK__EXTENSION_PERMISSIONS_NOT_ACC.message: You have to accept the permissions of the extension to proceed.

SAAS_EXTENSION_RESSOURCE_NOT_FOUND__EXTE.message: The extension could not be found.

SAAS_EXTENSION_RESSOURCE_NOT_FOUND__LICE.message: The extension license could not be found.

SAAS_EXTENSION_RESSOURCE_NOT_FOUND__BINA.message: The extension files could not be found.

SAAS_EXTENSION_CANCELLATION__STILL_IN_US.message: The extension cannot be canceled because it is still in use.

SAAS_EXTENSION_RATING__ALREADY_RATED.message: The extension has already been rated.

SAAS_EXTENSION_LICENSE__NOT_ALLOWED_TO_R.message: The extension license is not allowed to be reactivated.

SAAS_EXTENSION_DOWNLOAD__NOT_ALLOWED.message: Your shop is not allowed to download the extension.

SAAS_EXTENSION_ORDER__NOT_ALLOWED_PRICE_.message: The selected price model is not allowed for the extension.

SAAS_EXTENSION_ORDER__NO_DEFAULT_PAYMENT.message: There is no default payment mean available.

SAAS_EXTENSION_REQUEST__INVALID_CONTENT.message: Required request data is missing or invalid.

SAAS_EXTENSION_INVALID_BASKET__MULTIPLE_.message: The basket is invalid because it contains multiple licenses or it contains an already owned license.

SAAS_EXTENSION_INVALID_BASKET__INVALID_O.message: The basket is invalid because of an invalid order position.

SAAS_EXTENSION_INVALID_BASKET__INVALID_C.message: The basket is invalid because your company has no country assigned.

SAAS_EXTENSION_RATING__INVALID_EXTENSION.message: Your rating could not be saved because the related extension is invalid.
